name: Payment Dispute Management Automation
description: This automation pattern manages payment disputes via a self-service portal, integrating with Salesforce to record disputes, and automating communication with customers about the status and outcome of disputes. It utilizes decision matrices to process outcomes and notify customers accordingly, aligning with PCI-DSS and GDPR compliance requirements.

banned_tools: Avoid Google Cloud for hosting; opt for alternatives like AWS or Azure
required_integrations: normal data updates - data is transactional and posted the night beforehand.

llm_recommended_approach: Implement a self-service portal for customers to initiate disputes with live integrations to Salesforce for recording their details. Use decision matrices hosted on Pega for outcome algorithms. Notify customers automatically via email/SMS of the outcome, utilizing AWS cloud for scalable data processing. Ensure all systems are compliant with PCI-DSS and GDPR through encryption and secure data handling.
